meta.description: XEN.fyi qué es un proyecto de código abierto para ayudar al usuario a comprender el protocolo XEN y su ecosistema.

dashboard.title: Tablero
dashboard.chain-id: Identidad de la red: {{Identidad de la red}}
dashboard.amp-description: El amplificador de recompensa (Amp) es una parte dependiente del tiempo del cálculo de la recompensa del minteo XEN. Comienza en 3,000 Génesis y disminuye en 1 cada día hasta llegar a 1
dashboard.eaa-description: El amplificador de adopción temprana (EAA) es una parte del cálculo de recompensa del minteo XEN qué depende del Rango global actual. EAA comienza desde el 10% y disminuye de forma lineal en un 0.1% por cada 100,000 aumento en el rango global.
dashboard.apy-description: Annual Percentage Yield (APY) determines XEN Staking Reward calculation. It is non-compounding and is pro-rated by days. APY starts at 20% on Genesis and decreases by 1p.p. every 90 days until it reaches 2%

mint.title: Mint
mint.terms-details: Your mint starts by claiming a rank. Select the number of days you want to mint for. The longer you mint for, the more rewards you will receive. You can mint for a maximum of {{numberOfDays}} days.

stake.title: Stake
stake.terms-details: Withdraw original stake amount plus yield at any time after the maturity date, or at any time the original stake amount with 0 (zero) yield before the maturity date. One stake at a time per one address
stake.note-description: Your stake term is not over yet. You can end your stake early without a penalty without you yield or you can wait until your stake matures to get the full yield.
